name: Dragon Knight
storyline: DragonKnight is a player-oriented MMORPG on the Binance Smart Chain with a player-owned, blockchain backed economy, an exciting combat system and scarce tradeable NFT collectibles. Train your NFT dragon till it is strong enough to defeat your enemies in PvE combat or in PvP against real players and earn fantastic rewards.
summary: Dragon Knight is a innovative player-oriented NFT MMORPG on the Binance Smart Chain with a player-owned, blockchain backed economy, an exciting combat system with PvP and PvE battles and scarce tradeable NFT collectibles.
